name: Printed Shirt
description: Made from 100% breathable cotton, this printed shirt blends street-style attitude with all-day comfort. Featuring a relaxed silhouette, button-front closure, and a statement print that turns heads without trying too hard. Designed to wear solo or layered — from the sidewalk to your next rooftop session.

tabDescription.specsText: Made with 100% natural cotton and digitally printed using low-impact dyes, this shirt is a conscious pick for your wardrobe. The fabric is soft on skin, tough on wear, and designed to age with character. Mindfully made for those who care how it's made — and how it looks.
